resources.string: Please be advised that the following information is optional to divulge. However, it helps us with populating a customised activity plan that helps you to live a healthier life
Tap to Take a Photo,Hold to Record Video
We are always ready and alert to react to any emergency situation. Our Control Room operates 24/7 , even during public holidays.
Realtime locating you from where ever you , when you need assistance. Just slide , scream or shake your device and we will be there.
Connect your loved ones , famlily and friends to app and create your own safety net.

Our chat allow you to create group , share (media,document,location & many more) and you can voice and video call six user in conferencing. Upon a panic a emergency group to create with your safetynet members. .
Don\'t have an account? Sign Up
Enter the one time password send on
Provide your account email or phone number for which you want to reset password
Select which contact detail should we use to reset password
Your identity has been verified! \nSet your new password

● Individualized weekly and monthly wellness targets personalized for you based on your age, weight, height and comorbidities. 

 ● Real-time activity tracking through Pulse Wearables that is automatically recorded on the Pulse Health App 

 ● Weekly activity reports to help you stay on top of your wellness targets 

 ● Earn up to 30 000 Pulse Points through achieving your monthly targets 

 ● Redeem points for Rewards and Purchases in the Pulse Store. 

 ● Exclusive access to Pulse marathons, Walkathons and Zumba Sessions. 

 ● Discounts of up to 10% at Pulse Partner Restaurants

● Individualized weekly and monthly wellness targets personalized for you based on your age, weight, height and comorbidities. 

 ● Real-time activity tracking through Pulse Wearables that is automatically recorded on the Pulse Health App 

 ● Weekly activity reports to help you stay on top of your wellness targets 

 ● Earn up to 50 000 Pulse Points through achieving your monthly targets 

 ● Redeem points for Rewards and Purchases in the Pulse Store. 

 ● Exclusive access to Pulse marathons, Walkathons and Zumba Sessions. 

 ● Discounts of up to 20% at Pulse Partner Restaurants

● Individualized weekly and monthly wellness targets personalized for you based on your age, weight, height and comorbidities. 

 ● Access to Personal Pulse Fitness trainer to help encourage you towards your fitness goals 

 ● Access to a Personalized Diet and Eating Plan created exclusively for you by a Pulse Dietician 

 ● Earn up to 75 000 Pulse Points through achieving your monthly targets 

 ● Redeem points for Rewards and Purchases in the Pulse Store. 

 ● Discounts of up to 20% at Pulse Partner Restaurants 

 ● Redeem Pulse Points for Miles at Partner Airlines
